purpose.summary: COPAUS0C is a CICS online transaction program that displays a paginated list of up to 5 pending authorizations (PAUTDTL1 IMS segments) for a specified account ID on the PAULST screen (COPAU0AO map). It supports user interactions via AID keys: Enter to validate account/selection and XCTL to auth details if 'S' selected; PF7/PF8 for previous/next page; PF3 to return to menu. Data is retrieved sequentially from IMS using DLI GNP calls, with error messages displayed on invalid inputs or DB errors.
purpose.business_context: Pending authorization summary screen in a card demo (CARDDEMO) system for reviewing account authorizations, approvals, amounts, dates, and statuses.

inputs.name: COPAU0AI
inputs.description: Input BMS map containing account ID (ACCTIDI), selection flags (SEL0001I-SEL0005I), and transaction details (TRNIDxxI, PDATExxI, etc.) from user screen input

inputs.name: CARDDEMO-COMMAREA
inputs.description: Program linkage area carrying account ID (CDEMO-ACCT-ID), page num (CDEMO-CPVS-PAGE-NUM), auth keys (CDEMO-CPVS-AUTH-KEYS), flags (CDEMO-PGM-REENTER), and navigation context between screens

inputs.name: PAUTDTL1
inputs.description: IMS database segment containing pending auth details: key (PA-AUTHORIZATION-KEY), approved amt (PA-APPROVED-AMT), orig time/date (PA-AUTH-ORIG-TIME/DATE), resp code (PA-AUTH-RESP-CODE), transaction ID (PA-TRANSACTION-ID), type (PA-AUTH-TYPE), match status (PA-MATCH-STATUS)

outputs.name: COPAU0AO
outputs.description: Output BMS map populated with account ID (ACCTIDO), auth list details (TRNIDxxO/PDATExxO/PTIMExxO/PTYPExxO/PAPRVxxO/PSTATxxO/PAMTxxxO), selection fields (SEL000xA), and error message (ERRMSGO)

outputs.name: CARDDEMO-COMMAREA
outputs.description: Updated with current page num, prev/last auth keys (CDEMO-CPVS-PAUKEY-PREV-PG, CDEMO-CPVS-PAUKEY-LAST), selected auth key (CDEMO-CPVS-PAU-SELECTED), to/from program/TRANIDs, and context flags for navigation

called_programs.purpose: Transfer control to authorization detail program (e.g., WS-PGM-AUTH-DTL) when user selects an auth with 'S' on Enter key

business_rules.description: Account ID must be numeric and non-blank/low-values; else display error message and cursor to field
business_rules.logic_summary: Check ACCTIDI <> SPACES/LOW-VALUES and NUMERIC; set WS-ERR-FLG='Y', WS-MESSAGE, ACCTIDL=-1
conditions: IF ACCTIDI OF COPAU0AI = SPACES OR LOW-VALUES
IF ACCTIDI OF COPAU0AI IS NOT NUMERIC

business_rules.description: Authorization selection flag must be 'S' or 's' to XCTL to details; else invalid selection message
business_rules.logic_summary: EVALUATE SEL000xI to set CDEMO-CPVS-PAU-SELECTED; if SEL-FLG='S'/'s' then XCTL else error
conditions: WHEN SEL0001I OF COPAU0AI NOT = SPACES AND LOW-VALUES

business_rules.logic_summary: IF PA-AUTH-RESP-CODE = '00' MOVE 'A' ELSE 'D' to WS-AUTH-APRV-STAT

business_rules.description: Page forward/back only if not at limits; PF7 decrements page if >1, PF8 advances from last key if available
business_rules.logic_summary: PF7: if PAGE-NUM>1 compute -1, load prev key; PF8: load last key, reposition if exists

transforms.transformation_description: Reformat HHMMSS to HH:MM:SS by moving substrings: (1:2)->(1:2), (3:2)->(4:2), (5:2)->(7:2)
Reformat YYMMDD to MM/DD/YY via intermediate WS-CURDATE-YY/MM/DD then WS-CURDATE-MM-DD-YY
Direct move from segment to working storage for display formatting
Increment on page forward: COMPUTE CDEMO-CPVS-PAGE-NUM = CDEMO-CPVS-PAGE-NUM + 1 when WS-IDX=2

copybooks_used.purpose: Defines output BMS map fields for PAULST screen: account display (ACCTIDO), error msg (ERRMSGO), auth list (TRNIDxxO etc.)
Defines input BMS map fields: account input (ACCTIDI), selection inputs (SEL000xI), auth details inputs (TRNIDxxI etc.)
Common commarea for CARDDEMO programs: acct ID, page/auth keys, program navigation flags/context
IMS segment layout for PAUTDTL1: auth key, amounts, dates/times, resp codes, txn details

paragraphs.purpose: This is the primary procedure division entry point label (implied at PROGRAM-ID), but static analysis identifies it as a short dispatcher at line 23 calling multiple subroutines including COCOM01Y, COPAU00, COTTL01Y, CSDAT01Y, CSMSG01Y and others not shown in snippet. It consumes no explicit inputs beyond global CICS EIB/EIBCALEN and commarea. It produces initial screen sends and navigation setup by delegating to screen handling. Business logic checks first-time entry (EIBCALEN=0) vs re-enter. No explicit error handling here, defers to callees. Calls many utility programs for initialization/setup (e.g., date/time, messages). Note: Full calls not in snippet, relies on outline.

This is the main orchestration paragraph controlling the entire CICS transaction flow from entry to RETURN. It initializes flags (ERR-FLG-OFF, AUTHS-NOT-EOF, etc.), clears message/ACCTIDL, and branches based on EIBCALEN=0 (first entry: init commarea, set reenter flag, send initial screen) vs re-enter (load commarea, check reenter flag). On re-enter non-initial, receives map, evaluates EIBAID (ENTER->PROCESS-ENTER-KEY, PF3->RETURN-TO-PREV, PF7/PF8->page keys, OTHER->error), then sends screen. Outputs updated map (ACCTIDO, message) and commarea for RETURN with TRANSID. Business logic: 13 decision points including numeric ACCT-ID check, AID evaluation for navigation/processing. Errors set WS-ERR-FLG='Y', message, cursor=-1, re-send screen. Calls RECEIVE-PAULST-SCREEN, PROCESS-ENTER-KEY/PF7/PF8, GATHER-DETAILS, SEND-PAULST-SCREEN, RETURN-TO-PREV-SCREEN to handle user actions and refresh display. Finally EXEC CICS RETURN with updated commarea/TRANID.

This paragraph validates user input on Enter key and handles authorization selection for drill-down. It consumes input map ACCTIDI (account ID) and SEL000xI (selection flags 1-5). Validates ACCTIDI non-blank/numeric, sets WS-ACCT-ID/CDEMO-ACCT-ID if valid. Maps SEL000xI to CDEMO-CPVS-PAU-SELECTED key (1-5). If valid selection and flag='S'/'s', sets XCTL to auth detail program with context (FROM-TO programs/TRANID). Outputs error messages to WS-MESSAGE if invalid ACCT/SEL/non-'S', sets cursor=-1. Business logic: 8 decisions - blank check, numeric check, SEL mapping EVALUATE, SEL-FLG='S'/'s' check. Errors: invalid input messages, no XCTL. Calls GATHER-DETAILS to refresh list post-validation, CDEMO-TO-PROGRAM via XCTL if selected.

Orchestrates data gathering for screen refresh based on current WS-ACCT-ID. Consumes WS-ACCT-ID from prior validation. Resets cursor=-1, page-num=0. If valid ACCT-ID, calls GATHER-ACCOUNT-DETAILS (presum. cust/card/xref data), INITIALIZE-AUTH-DATA (clear lists), and if PAUT-SMRY found, PROCESS-PAGE-FORWARD to load first page. Outputs initialized auth lists/page keys in commarea/map via callees. No direct business decisions (6 delegated), but conditions on ACCT-ID valid and segment found. No explicit errors, propagates flags. Calls sub-paragraphs to fetch account summary and populate first page of auths.

Handles previous page (PF7) navigation. Consumes current CDEMO-CPVS-PAGE-NUM and PAUKEY-PREV-PG array. If page >1, decrements page-num (COMPUTE at 185 equiv), loads prev key to WS-AUTH-KEY-SAVE, calls GET-AUTH-SUMMARY, sets no-erase/next-page flags, cursor=-1, INITIALIZE-AUTH-DATA, PROCESS-PAGE-FORWARD. Else error message 'already at top'. Outputs updated page num/keys/map. Business logic: 2 decisions - page>1 check. Errors: boundary message, no-erase. Calls GET-AUTH-SUMMARY, INITIALIZE-AUTH-DATA, PROCESS-PAGE-FORWARD for reload.

Handles next page (PF8) navigation from last key. Consumes CDEMO-CPVS-PAUKEY-LAST. If not blank/low, loads to WS-AUTH-KEY-SAVE, GET-AUTH-SUMMARY, REPOSITION-AUTHORIZATIONS. Sets no-erase, cursor=-1; if next-page-yes, INITIALIZE/PROCESS-PAGE-FORWARD else 'at bottom' message. Outputs repositioned page data. Business logic: 5 decisions - last key valid, next-page-yes post-repos. Errors: boundary message. Calls GET-AUTH-SUMMARY, REPOSITION-AUTHORIZATIONS, INITIALIZE-AUTH-DATA, PROCESS-PAGE-FORWARD.

Loads/populates one page (5 auths max) starting from current position. Consumes WS-IDX=1 init, flags ERR-FLG-OFF/AUTHS-NOT-EOF. Loops PERFORM UNTIL WS-IDX>5 or EOF/ERR: conditional REPOSITION (PF7 first) or GET-AUTHORIZATIONS, if success POPULATE-AUTH-LIST, inc WS-IDX, save LAST/PREV-PG keys, inc page-num at 2nd. Post-loop, peek next GET-AUTHORIZATIONS to set NEXT-PAGE-YES/NO. Outputs populated map fields (via POPULATE), commarea keys/page. Business logic: 12 decisions in loop (PF7 cond, EOF/ERR checks, WS-IDX=2 inc). Loop terminates WS-IDX>5/EOF/ERR-ON (424 equiv). Errors propagate flags. Calls REPOSITION/GET-AUTHORIZATIONS x2, POPULATE-AUTH-LIST.

Performs IMS DLI GNP call to fetch next PAUTDTL1 segment sequentially. No explicit inputs (uses current PCB/position). Populates PENDING-AUTH-DETAILS. Evaluates DIBSTAT: OK->NOT-EOF, NOT-FOUND/EOF->EOF, OTHER->ERR-FLG='Y', build error msg w/IMS-RETURN-CODE, cursor=-1, SEND screen. Outputs segment data/flags. Business logic: EVALUATE IMS status. Errors: system msg + immediate screen send/abort flow. Calls SEND-PAULST-SCREEN on error.

Repositions IMS cursor to specific auth using WS-AUTH-KEY-SAVE -> PA-AUTHORIZATION-KEY, DLI GNP with WHERE PAUT9CTS=KEY. Populates PENDING-AUTH-DETAILS. Evaluates DIBSTAT same as GET: OK/NOT-EOF, NOT-FOUND/EOF->EOF, OTHER->ERR msg + SEND. Outputs segment/flags. Business logic: status eval post-qualified GNP. Errors: repos-specific msg + screen.

Transforms IMS segment data to screen map fields for current WS-IDX (1-5). Consumes PAUT* fields, computes WS-AUTH-AMT/TIME/DATE/APRV-STAT (reformat date/time, 'A'/'D' on resp='00'). EVALUATE WS-IDX to move to specific mapset fields (TRNIDxxI etc., SEL000xA=unprot). Saves key to CDEMO-CPVS-AUTH-KEYS(WS-IDX). Outputs 55 map fields populated. Business logic: 4 decisions - resp-code check, IDX 1-5 mapping. No loops/errors explicit. No calls.

error_handling.action: Set WS-ERR-FLG='Y', WS-MESSAGE='Please enter Acct Id...', ACCTIDL=-1
Set WS-ERR-FLG='Y', WS-MESSAGE='Acct Id must be Numeric...', ACCTIDL=-1
WS-ERR-FLG='Y', STRING error msg with IMS-RETURN-CODE, ACCTIDL=-1, SEND-PAULST-SCREEN
WS-ERR-FLG='Y', ACCTIDL=-1, WS-MESSAGE='Invalid key', SEND screen
WS-MESSAGE='Invalid selection. Valid value is S', ACCTIDL=-1

error_handling.condition: Page boundaries (PF7 page=1, PF8 no last key/next-no)

cics_operations.purpose: End transaction, pass back updated commarea for potential re-entry
Transfer control to selected authorization detail program without return
Receive user input from screen map (implied in RECEIVE-PAULST-SCREEN)
Send populated/error screen to user (implied in SEND-PAULST-SCREEN)
